Structs/RunkaiKit.html#/s:9RunkaiKitAAV0.name: retrieveCloudKitRecord(withIdentifier:public:)
Structs/RunkaiKit.html#/s:9RunkaiKitAAV0.abstract: Retrieve the corresponding record with the given id. Throws an error when encounters one.

Structs/RunkaiKit.html#/s:9RunkaiKitAAV1.name: isIcloudAvailable()
Structs/RunkaiKit.html#/s:9RunkaiKitAAV1.abstract: Detect whether this is the device as an iCloud account logged on.

Structs/RunkaiKit.html#/s:9RunkaiKitAAV1.name: retrieveHTML(from:)
Structs/RunkaiKit.html#/s:9RunkaiKitAAV1.abstract: Retrieve the raw HTML code from the URL provided.

Structs/RunkaiKit.html#/s:9RunkaiKitAAV1.name: isFirstTimeLaunch()
Structs/RunkaiKit.html#/s:9RunkaiKitAAV1.abstract: Detect whether this is the first time this app ever launched.

Structs/RKRift.html#/s:9RunkaiKit6RKRift.name: evaluateInt(for:)
Structs/RKRift.html#/s:9RunkaiKit6RKRift.abstract: Use this function to evaluate the children of a RKNode

Structs/RKRift.html#/s:9RunkaiKit6RKRift.name: evaluateFloat(for:)
Structs/RKRift.html#/s:9RunkaiKit6RKRift.abstract: Use this function to evaluate the children of a RKNode

Structs/RKRift.html#/s:9RunkaiKit6RKRift.name: evaluateDouble(for:)
Structs/RKRift.html#/s:9RunkaiKit6RKRift.abstract: Use this function to evaluate the children of a RKNode

Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.name: delegate
Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.abstract: The RMFunctionDelegate that will be handling this function’s status.

Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.name: id
Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.abstract: The id for this function, can be any Int number as long as it is unique.

Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.name: xLowerBound
Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.abstract: The lower bound of x in the calculation.

Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.name: xUpperBound
Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.abstract: The upper bound of x in the calculation.

Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.name: init(withId:k:n:xLowerBound:xUpperBound:)
Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.abstract: Initializes a standard power function with two constants: kx^n

Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.name: calculate(completionHandler:)
Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.abstract: Calculate the power function with its values it has.

Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.name: translation(x:y:completionHandler:)
Structs/RMFunction/power.html#/s:9Runkai.abstract: Calculate the function with its values it has but applied with transitions.

Structs/RMFunction/power.html.name: power
Structs/RMFunction/power.html.abstract: A power function, where both k and n are constants, creates a parabola when graphed.

Structs/RMFunction.html.name: RMFunction
Structs/RMFunction.html.abstract: A structure that contains all of the RMath functions.

Structs/RunkaiKit.html.name: RunkaiKit
Structs/RunkaiKit.html.abstract: The main structure of RunkaiKit where most of the general functions rests.

Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.name: delegate
Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.abstract: The RMFunctionDelegate that will be handling the function’s status.

Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.name: id
Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.abstract: The id for the function, can be any Int number as long as it is unique.

Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.name: xLowerBound
Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.abstract: The lower bound of x in the calculation.

Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.name: xUpperBound
Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.abstract: The upper bound of x in the calculation.

Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.name: translation(x:y:completionHandler:)
Protocols/RMFunctionProtocol.html#/s:9Ru.abstract: Calculate the function with its values it has but applied with transitions.

Protocols/RMFunctionDelegate.html.name: RMFunctionDelegate
Protocols/RMFunctionDelegate.html.abstract: Use this delegate to monitor RMFunction status and progress.

Enums/CalculationError.html#/s:9RunkaiKi.name: invalidOperator
Enums/CalculationError.html#/s:9RunkaiKi.abstract: Returns when an unsupported operator is used.

Enums/CalculationError.html#/s:9RunkaiKi.name: inputOverflow
Enums/CalculationError.html#/s:9RunkaiKi.abstract: Returns when an unsupported number of inputs is used

Enums/CalculationError.html#/s:9RunkaiKi.name: invalidInput
Enums/CalculationError.html#/s:9RunkaiKi.abstract: Returns when an unsupported input is used.

Enums/CalculationError.html.name: CalculationError
Enums/CalculationError.html.abstract: A collection of errors that can be thrown when calculating with RKNodes.

Classes/RKNode.html#/s:9RunkaiKit6RKNode.name: search(value:)
Classes/RKNode.html#/s:9RunkaiKit6RKNode.abstract: Search for the children of a RKNode with its value

Classes/RKNode.html.name: RKNode
Classes/RKNode.html.abstract: The main RKNode which supports an indefinite amount of children.
